results.deck: Rebel Raiders: Operation Nighthawk is a futuristic aerial combat game.  The game takes place in the distant future where human beings have conquered the solar system.
results.name: Rebel Raiders: Operation Nighthawk

results.deck: Sonic Unleashed is two different Sonic titles released in 2008 across four consoles. Both titles feature high-speed Sonic stages, slower-paced "Werehog" levels, and town hubs where players must progress through the story.
results.name: Sonic Unleashed

results.deck: Take to the slopes in this new snowboarding franchise from Ubisoft. Create your own paths, film your own tricks and share them with the world.
results.name: Shaun White Snowboarding

results.deck: Pro Evolution Soccer has been the mainstay of many a hardcore gamers with it's focus of game play and customization, particular popular in Asia and Western Europe where it has built a fanatical base of devoted editors and players alike.
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2009

results.deck: An adventure game based around the Comic Book character Diabolik.
results.name: Diabolik: The Original Sin

results.deck: The History Channel: Battle for the Pacific is a first person shooter set in the Pacific Theater.
results.name: The History Channel: Battle for the Pacific

results.deck: A virtual collection of Hasbro classic games, Sorry!, Scrabble, Battleship, Connect Four, Boggle, and Yahtzee, as well as new Sorry! Sliders.
results.name: Hasbro Family Game Night

results.deck: Monster Jam: Urban Assault is multi-platform game based on real life Monster Jam motorsport show
results.name: Monster Jam: Urban Assault

results.deck: Thirteen of the greatest (and not so greatest) pinball machines from famed pinball table manufacturer, Williams.
results.name: Pinball Hall of Fame: The Williams Collection

results.deck: After being side-kick to Ratchet for so long, Clank takes matters into his own hands to save Ratchet and solve the crime of the century.
results.name: Secret Agent Clank

results.deck: This compilation includes 6 Samurai Shodown games on one disc.
results.name: Samurai Shodown Anthology

results.deck: Globs of Doom is an action adventure game featuring 10 playable characters from the Nickelodeon universe.
results.name: SpongeBob SquarePants featuring Nicktoons: Globs of Doom

results.deck: Simulate bull riding at the professional level.  Customize your character, take the role of a professional rider, or even take the role of a bull.  Yes, you heard me.  I actually think that's pretty interesting.
results.name: Professional Bull Riders: Out of the Chute

results.deck: In Army Men: Soldiers of Misfortune, you play as Timmy, fighting alongside the Green Army against the sinister Tan Army.
results.name: Army Men: Soldiers of Misfortune

results.deck: EA Sports returns with the '09 edition of FIFA, a soccer simulation video game series. FIFA 09 features gameplay and graphic improvements from its predecessor, FIFA 08, as well as increased amount of players, leagues, and stadiums, and you have more control overall in the game.
results.name: FIFA Soccer 09

results.deck: Suzuki TT Superbikes is a motorcylce racing game that takes place on the Isle of Man and other locales. The game boasts a truly accurate recreation of the 37.73 mile TT course.
results.name: Suzuki TT Superbikes Real Road Racing

results.deck: Avatar -The Last Airbender: Into the Inferno takes place in the third and final season of the show where Aang must take on the Fire lord.
results.name: Avatar - The Last Airbender: Into the Inferno

results.deck: Vaguely music related minigames in a horrible Bratz licensed package.
results.name: Bratz: Girlz Really Rock!

results.deck: Disney Sing It is a new video-based karaoke game featuring the hottest new Disney talents.
results.name: Disney Sing It

results.deck: A hybrid RPG/board game that allows players to move around on a board more freely and battle other players.
results.name: Dokapon Kingdom

results.deck: A cooking game based on the hit reality TV show Gordon Ramsay's Hells KItchen, the main man is now here to take out his aggressions on us when we mess it all up in the kitchen!
results.name: Hell's Kitchen
Tak and the Guardians of Gross

results.deck: Game based on the Disney movie by the same name.
results.name: Disney's Bolt

results.deck: Ben 10 Alien Force is based in the world of the popular cartoon network show "Ben 10."
results.name: Ben 10 Alien Force: The Game

results.deck: A video game based on the hit television show on Nickelodeon.
results.name: Naked Brothers Band

results.deck: This 3D platformer puts players in the role of Barbie as she explores the wilderness with her horse.
results.name: Barbie Horse Adventures: Summer Camp

results.deck: Fox's ridiculously popular trivia game show on television adds yet another layer visual torture with a video game adaptation.
results.name: Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader? Make the Grade!

results.deck: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 3 is the third installment in Namco Bandai's Budokai Tenkaichi series. The game was released for PS2 and Wii on December 3rd, 2007.  It was notable for containing more Dragonball Z characters and content than any other game before it.
results.name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 3

results.deck: StarCraft: Ghost was supposed to be a third person stealth action shooter that took place within the StarCraft Universe. The game went through a lengthy development cycle with many release date delays, eventually being announced as "on hold" in March 2006, but it's generally assumed to be cancelled.
results.name: StarCraft Ghost

results.deck: Travel back in time over and over again in this revolutionary 2D real time strategy title from Vanillaware and NIS.
results.name: GrimGrimoire

results.deck: Tales of Symphonia is a cel-shaded action RPG and is another game in Namco's Tales series. It expands upon the series' battle system and emphasizes on relationships with other characters by the decisions you make throughout the game.
results.name: Tales of Symphonia

results.deck: Pro Evolution Soccer 6 is a soccer game made by Konami.
results.name: Winning Eleven: Pro Evolution Soccer 2007

results.deck:
Ninjabread Man is a platformer from English developer/publisher Data Design Interactive. The game was released on the PlayStation 2 and PC in July 2005, and on the Wii in 2007.

The main character is a gingerbread ninja. He is sent on a mission to save the world from enemies which include pastries, candy and bees.
results.name: Ninjabread Man

results.deck: With a mixture of simulation and arcade style gameplay, MLB 2K5 tries to bring the best of both worlds into one game. MLB 2K5 is also the last MLB 2K game to have full ESPN presentation integration.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K5

results.deck: The MLB 2K series returns for the 2007 season with this installment.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K7

results.deck: The ruthless, stealth-action series returns for a second installment.
results.name: Manhunt 2

results.deck: College baseball gets its day in the sun with MVP 06.
results.name: MVP 06 NCAA Baseball

results.deck: NCAA baseball returns for a second installment in MVP 07. This would be EA's last venture into College baseball.
results.name: MVP 07 NCAA Baseball

results.deck: Looney Tunes: Space Race is a kart racing game featuring classic Warner Brothers cartoon characters.
results.name: Looney Tunes: Space Race

results.deck: Disney Golf is a spiritual successor to Swing Away Golf, themed with Disney characters.
results.name: Disney Golf

results.deck: The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy is a brawling fighting game featuring the characters of the Cartoon Network television show.
results.name: The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy

results.deck: Shadow Showdown is a game based off of the Nicktoons animated television show The Fairly OddParents, and the sequel to Breakin' Da Rules.
results.name: The Fairly OddParents: Shadow Showdown

results.deck: The Hobbit is a 3D action-adventure platformer based on J. R. R. Tolkien's prequel to The Lord of the Rings.
results.name: The Hobbit

results.deck: Mystery Mayhem is a multi-platform release featuring the cartoon detectives and their favorite canine coward.
results.name: Scooby-Doo: Mystery Mayhem

results.deck: In the latest addition to the franchise, Private Anderson must fight an enemy named Major Malfunction.
results.name: Army Men: Major Malfunction

results.deck: A fighting game for the Playstation 2 made by Taito based on the anime and manga of the same name.
results.name: Erementar Gerad: Matoe, Suifu no Ken

results.deck: The second volume of Taito Memories II released for Playstation 2 in Japan.  Includes 25 Taito arcade games.
results.name: Taito Memories II Gekan

results.deck: Juiced 2: Hot Import Nights is a racing video game for various platforms.
results.name: Juiced 2: Hot Import Nights

results.deck: The latest and possible the last in the College 2K series. Many improvements are subtle, but the changes and additions to College Hoops 2K8 make it the best game in the series.
results.name: College Hoops 2K8

results.deck: NHL 09 adds major improvements to the franchise, such as the defense skill stick and the highly praised Be A Pro Mode, to make this sports game one of the best of 2008.
results.name: NHL 09

results.deck: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers is a fantasy action game that covers the first two films in the Lord of the Rings trilogy.
results.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

results.deck: The fourth expansion in the Final Fantasy XI Online series adds new areas along with the ability to go back in time.  Wings of the Goddess also introduces two new jobs to the game.
results.name: Final Fantasy XI Online: Wings of the Goddess

results.deck: Looney Tunes: Acme Arsenal is a third-person action title featuring popular characters from the Looney Tunes featurettes.
results.name: Looney Tunes: Acme Arsenal

results.deck: Wacky Races is a racing game adaptation of the Hanna-Barbara cartoon series.
results.name: Wacky Races

results.deck: A Playstation 2 port of the Arc System Works developed fighting game based on the manga/anime of the same name.
results.name: Hokuto no Ken: Shinpan no Sousousei Kengou Retsuden

results.deck: The sixth installment in the SingStar franchise.
results.name: SingStar Amped

results.deck: Soul Nomad & the World Eaters is a Strategy-RPG that focuses on fighting with large-scale units to defeat enemies without relying on the main character's overpowered stats.
results.name: Soul Nomad & the World Eaters

results.deck: The fifth installment in the SingStar franchise for the PlayStation 2, featuring classics from Nirvana, The Rolling Stones and Queen alongside newcomers such as Bloc Party, Franz Ferdinand and Maximo Park.
results.name: SingStar Rocks!

results.deck: The eighth installment of the SingStar franchise, featuring songs from the top of the charts by Nelly Furtado, Norah Jones, Lily Allen, Corinne Baily Rae and more.
results.name: SingStar Pop Hits

results.deck: The eleventh title in the SingStar franchise, the track list this time comprising heart-wrenching ballads.
results.name: SingStar Rock Ballads

results.deck: The thirteenth installment in the SingStar franchise, featuring old and new feel good hits of the summer.
results.name: SingStar Summer Party

results.deck: NBA 2K6 is the seventh installment of the NBA 2K series of realistic basketball games, updating the roster to the 2005/2006 NBA season while adding new control mechanics.
results.name: NBA 2K6

results.deck: A fighting game for the PS2 developed by Arc System Works and published by Capcom as part of their Sengoku Basara (aka Devil Kings) series.
results.name: Sengoku Basara X

results.deck: Go head-to-head with the greatest PDC Champions.
results.name: PDC World Championship Darts 2008

results.deck: Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 4 is a role-playing game developed and published by Atlus for Sony's PlayStation 2, and chronologically the fifth installment in the Shin Megami Tensei: Persona series.  Persona 4 game play combines the traditional role-playing game with elements of a simulation game.
results.name: Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 4

results.deck: The third installment of the Ultimate Ninja series (Narutimate Ninja in Japan), Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 3 is for the Playstation 2.
results.name: Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 3

results.deck: ProStroke Golf - World Tour 2007 is a golf sim developed by Gusto Games and published by Oxygen Interactive Software. It was released on the PC, PS2, Xbox and PSP.
results.name: ProStroke Golf : World Tour 2007

results.deck: The Two Thrones is the fourth and final game in the Sands Of Time series. It tells of the Princes quest to finish the corrupted, power hungry Vizier and his negative parts of his mind.
results.name: Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones

results.deck:
WWII: Battle Over The Pacific is a flight combat that that was developed by Midas Interactive Entertainment.
It was released on the PS2, PSP, and PC.
results.name: WWII: Battle Over The Pacific

results.deck: Featuring Korean Hyundai cars for the first time.
results.name: Gran Turismo Concept: 2002 Tokyo-Seoul

results.deck: A compilation of 5 Namco PS1 games including Ridge Racer, Tekken, Ace Combat 2, Mr. Driller, and Klonoa.
results.name: namCollection

results.deck: This tactical, turn-based strategy game from Idea Factory features a dream team of Japanese game characters from Shadow Hearts, Growlanser, Spectral Souls, and Gungrave.  Lead a specialized team to defeat the evil that caused such a crazy crossover, and restore order to the many universes this danger threatens.
results.name: Chaos Wars

results.deck: The third racing game in the Crash Bandicoot franchise.  Play as eight characters from the Crash bandicoot series!
results.name: Crash Tag Team Racing

results.deck: The lone survivor of the Quartz Zone Massacre, the Rogue Trooper hunts for the traitor general in a mission of revenge.
results.name: Rogue Trooper

results.deck: Madden NFL 08 is the 19th installment in the Madden franchise. While flaunting enhanced graphics, this version also introduced new animations, Hit Stick 2.0, and a player "weapon" mechanic to help distinguish the good from the great.
results.name: Madden NFL 08

results.deck: Dynasty Warriors meets Gundam in a spin-off of the Dynasty Warriors franchise. Dynasty Warriors: Gundam brings two popular franchises into one game with characters and mobile suits from series ranging from the original Mobile Suit Gundam to G Gundam.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors: Gundam

results.deck: In Taiko Drum Master, play familiar songs to the beat of the titular Japanese instrument. Additional minigames are included which take advantage of the bundled drum peripheral.
results.name: Taiko Drum Master

results.deck: The true sequel to Tales of Destiny.
results.name: Tales of Destiny 2

results.deck: Atelier Iris 3: Grand Phantasm is a console role-playing game developed by GUST for the PlayStation 2. It is the third and final game in the Atelier Iris saga.
results.name: Atelier Iris 3: Grand Phantasm

results.deck: Black & Bruised is a cartoon boxing game made for the Gamecube and PS2.
results.name: Black & Bruised

results.deck: NBA 2K8 continues a five year legacy as the #1 rated NBA simulation with in-game features that bring basketball to life like never before.
results.name: NBA 2K8

results.deck: UFC: Sudden Impact is the second game released on the Playstation 2 based on the popular mixed martial arts organization.
results.name: UFC: Sudden Impact

results.deck: The second full game in the Oneechanbara franchise created by Tamsoft. Features the gunwielding Reiko as a new playable character.
results.name: Simple Series 2000 Vol. 90: The Oneechanbara 2

results.deck: Pride FC: Fighting Championships is a game based on the Japanese mixed martial arts organization of the same name.
results.name: Pride FC: Fighting Championships

results.deck: NFL Blitz Pro showcases authentic 11-on-11 gameplay with real NFL teams, players and stadiums, while still providing the well-known Midway Sports "edge."
results.name: NFL Blitz: Pro

results.deck: Hourglass of Summer is a visual novel wherein a boy begins inexplicably traveling through random intervals of his summer vacation. Discovering that the girl he likes will die before the summer's end, he must do everything in his power to prevent this future from coming to be.
results.name: Hourglass of Summer

results.deck: This PAL-Japan only release feutures Bomberman in several sports-based activities,as well as the classic Bomberman mode.
results.name: Bomberman Hardball

results.deck: Ar Tonelico II: Melody of Metafalica is the sequel to Ar tonelico: Melody of Elemia and takes place around one and a half years after the original.
results.name: Ar tonelico II: Melody of Metafalica

results.deck: Based on the movie of the same name, Alvin and the Chipmunks is a rhythm game featuring tracks like 'Heartbreak Hotel' and 'Love Shack'.
results.name: Alvin and the Chipmunks

results.deck: Power up your ki and duke it out in the cel-shaded fighter Super Dragon Ball Z.
results.name: Super Dragon Ball Z

results.deck: Beginning with the events of Marvel's Secret War and going into Civil War, players will take control of several Marvel characters in this follow up to the first Ultimate Alliance game.
results.name: Marvel Ultimate Alliance 2

results.deck: Phantom of Inferno is a visual novel game based on a group of assassins with one boy in particular. Taking the role of this boy, you follow him through a tale of murder, love, and revenge that spawned three separate releases.
results.name: Phantom of Inferno

results.deck: Based on the popular anime and manga. Released only in Japan.
results.name: GANTZ: The Game

results.deck: An upgraded version of The OneeChanbara 2, featuring more playable characters. Known as The OneeChampon ~ The Oneechan 2 Special Chapter ~ in Japan.
results.name: Zombie Hunters 2

results.deck: Based on the animated film of the same name, Arthur and the Invisibles is an adventure game featuring various puzzles and obstacles.
results.name: Arthur and the Invisibles

results.deck: A minigame collection that puts more emphasis on the Rabbids, rather than Rayman himself.
results.name: Rayman: Raving Rabbids
